data.meanings: to be bright with sunshine, be glorious, be sunny. shams - sun.
data.sentence: The word الشَّمْسُ comes from the root ش م س and is associated with the meanings: to be bright with sunshine, be glorious, be sunny. shams - sun.
The word كُوِّرَتْ comes from the root ك و ر and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Ra) To wind, twist.
